beta-warning: This is a prototype. Bugs can be reported in our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/cwts-ict/JournalObservatory-Web/issues). The data may not be fully complete and up-to-date.
about-text: The Journal Observatory Browser is a proof-of-concept demonstrator showing the power of integrating journal information from diverse open data sources to support three use-case areas: open access publishing, preprinting and peer review procedures.

The Journal Observatory Browser aggregates data from [DOAJ](https://doaj.org), [Sherpa Romeo](https://sherpa.ac.uk/romeo/), [OpenAlex](https://openalex.org), and [Wikidata](https://www.wikidata.org), as well as data provided by publishers.

The Journal Observatory Browser uses the [Scholarly Communication Platform Framework](https://journalobservatory.org/framework/) developed in the [Journal Observatory](https://journalobservatory.org) project funded by the [Dutch Research Council (NWO)](https://www.nwo.nl/en).

The Journal Observatory Browser has been developed by [Bram van den Boomen](https://orcid.org/0009-0005-5127-1200) and [Nees Jan van Eck](https://orcid.org/0000-0001-8448-4521) at the [Centre for Science and Technology Studies (CWTS)](https://www.cwts.nl) at [Leiden University](https://www.universiteitleiden.nl/en).
publication-policy-filter-text: Filter based on the publication policies of journals/platforms.
elsewhere-policy-filter-text: Filter based on the preprinting/self-archiving policies of journals/platforms.
evaluation-policy-filter-text: Filter based on the evaluation policies of journals/platforms.
sources-text: Sources of information about the journal/platform.
provenance-text: Show information about the journal/platform in linked data format.
